radiographic_examinations.findings: A soft-tissue density on the left side, but none on the right, with no bony abnormalities or soft-tissue calcifications.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Lesions on the left leg grew from between 6 and 10 mm in diameter to nearly 20 mm.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild prominence of the pulmonary interstitium without focal consolidation or pleural effusion. The mediastinal contours were normal with no definite hilar or mediastinal lymphadenopathy.
